subsection.name: What is anycode ?
subsection.p: Anycode is a code generation plugin for Astah* modeling software. It exports UML models, packages, classes to any text files thanks to customizable templates written in Groovy language. It is designed in such a way that it does not depend on any target programming language. In other words, it's up to you to generate any source files, or even documentation.

It also provides a "directive" mechanism, i.e. : a set of functions that can be called from a template and that address code generation tasks. Some directives are provided out of the box but you can also define your own libraries.

subsection.name: Why an Astah* Plugin ?
subsection.p: Astah* is a user friendly UML modeling software, that enables to design domain models efficiently. Moreover, it provides a free community version as well as a free SDK to extend it. Astah* user interface keeps very simple to use. Anycode tries to adopt the same objective

subsection.name: How it works ?
subsection.p: The main objective of this plugin is to make code generation customizable, and easy.
